mapper.sql: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,I.COMP_CODE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, I.CODE)+CONVERT(VARCHAR, I.LINE_NBR)+CONVERT(VARCHAR,I.LINE_NBR_DET) AS CONCATKEY, I.COMP_CODE, I.LINE_NBR_DET, I.CODE, I.LINE_NBR, I.FROM_GL, (SELECT GG.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM GEN_LEDGER GG WHERE GG.COMP_CODE = #{COMP_CODE} AND GG.GL_CODE = I.FROM_GL) AS FROM_GLSTR, I.TO_GL, (SELECT GG.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM GEN_LEDGER GG WHERE GG.COMP_CODE = #{COMP_CODE} AND GG.GL_CODE = I.TO_GL) AS TO_GLSTR, I.GL_COMP, (SELECT C.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM COMPANIES C WHERE C.COMP_CODE = I.GL_COMP) AS GL_COMP_NAME, I.BRANCH_CODE, CASE WHEN I.BRANCH_CODE = 0 THEN 'ALL BRANCHES' ELSE (SELECT B.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM BRANCHES B WHERE B.BRANCH_CODE = I.BRANCH_CODE AND B.COMP_CODE = I.COMP_CODE) END AS BRANCH_NAME, I.DIV_CODE, CASE WHEN I.DIV_CODE = 0 THEN 'ALL DIVISIONS' ELSE (SELECT D.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM DIVISIONS D WHERE D.DIVISION_CODE = I.DIV_CODE AND D.COMP_CODE = I.COMP_CODE) END AS DIV_NAME, I.DEPT_CODE, CASE WHEN I.DEPT_CODE = 0 THEN 'ALL DEPARTMENTS' ELSE (SELECT DEPT.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM DEPARTMENTS DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPT_CODE = I.DEPT_CODE AND DEPT.COMP_CODE = I.COMP_CODE AND DIVISION_CODE = I.DIV_CODE) END AS DEPT_NAME, I.PERCENTAGE, I.CALC_TYPE, (SELECT S.VALUE_DESC FROM SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS S WHERE S.VALUE_CODE = I.CALC_TYPE AND S.LOV_TYPE_ID = 4 AND S.LANG_CODE = #{LANG_CODE}) AS CALC_TYPE_NAME, (CASE WHEN I.EXCLUDE_CLOSING_ENTRY = 'Y' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END) AS EXCLUDE_CLOSING_ENTRY FROM GLSTMPLTGLSDET I WHERE COMP_CODE = #{COMP_CODE} AND CODE = #{CODE} AND LINE_NBR = #{LINE_NBR}

SELECT
CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.COMP_CODE,0)))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.BRANCH_CODE,0)))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.CURRENCY_CODE,0)))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.GL_CODE,0)))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.CIF_SUB_NO,0)))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.SL_NO,0))))
CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.COMP_CODE,0)))) || CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.BRANCH_CODE,0)))) || CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.CURRENCY_CODE,0)))) || CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.GL_CODE,0)))) || CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.CIF_SUB_NO,0)))) || CONVERT(VARCHAR,ABS(CONVERT(NUMERIC,COALESCE (AMF.SL_NO,0))))
AS CONCATKEY, AMF.COMP_CODE COMP_CODE, AMF.BRANCH_CODE BRANCH_CODE, AMF.CURRENCY_CODE CURRENCY_CODE, AMF.GL_CODE GL_CODE, AMF.CIF_SUB_NO CIF_SUB_NO, AMF.SL_NO SL_NO, 'N' INCLUDE, ROUND(#{tmpCode}, 0) TEMP_CODE, ROUND(#{tmpltLineNbr}, 0) TMPLT_LINE_NBR, ROUND(#{subLineNbr}, 0) SUB_LINE_NBR, 0 OLD_SUB_LINE_NBR, 'false' AS INC FROM AMF WHERE AMF.COMP_CODE = #{compCode} AND AMF.GL_CODE BETWEEN #{fromGL} AND #{toGL} AND ((#{branch} = 0) OR (AMF.BRANCH_CODE = #{branch})) AND ((#{div} = 0) OR (AMF.DIV = #{div})) AND ((#{dpt} = 0) OR (AMF.DEPT = #{dpt})) AND AMF.STATUS NOT IN ('D', 'C', 'M') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FTR_ACCOUNTS WHERE FTR_ACCOUNTS.TEMP_CODE = #{tmpCode} AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.TMPLT_LINE_NBR = #{tmpltLineNbr} AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.SUB_LINE_NBR = #{subLineNbr} AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.COMP_CODE = AMF.COMP_CODE AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.BRANCH_CODE = AMF.BRANCH_CODE AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.CURRENCY_CODE = AMF.CURRENCY_CODE AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.GL_CODE = AMF.GL_CODE AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.CIF_SUB_NO = AMF.CIF_SUB_NO AND FTR_ACCOUNTS.SL_NO = AMF.SL_NO)
